Why Aren't We?
 
 My daughter and her family live in England-her husband serves in the U.S. military. Fortunately she lives a goodly distance from London and it is most unlikely that she or her family would have been on the subways of London. Nevertheless, I am distressed by the incidence of this great danger in the land where she lives.
 
 Why isn't George Bush fighting terrorism? Why are we in Iraq? There were no terrorists in Iraq until George Bush opened the borders of Iraq to terrorism.
 
 I have two words for terrorism.
 
 Saudi Arabia.
 
 I'll repeat those words again.
 
 Saudi Arabia.
 
 And, just for the stupid people who voted for George Bush.
 
 Saudi Arabia.
 
 Are you proud that your Bushy Boy kisses up and holds hands with the people who are the terrorists?
 
 And, one more thing. You people who think you have to drive big, gas-guzzling, clumsy SUVs. I don't like you. I think you are selfish, nasty people who don't give a demn about others. I hate that you are enabling the work of terrorists with your gas-guzzling ways.

Ah yes, Bush can never be to blame. He is a god, and therefore is never wrong. Ever. All praise the great leader Bush, for in his infinite wisdom he has decreed that our sons and daughters be sacrificed upon the mantle of unnecesary war. Who are we to question his intelligence?
